</div>
<br/>
<h3 className="c-secondary">Testable Criteria 5.1.0: False Or Misleading Representation</h3>
<b>Outcome: AI Company should not make false or misleading claims for its models.</b>

<table>
  <tbody>
    <tr>
      <th style={{padding: "10px"}}>No.</th>
      <th>Question</th>
      <th>Relation to Outcome</th>

    </tr>

    <tr>
      <td style={{padding: "10px 10px 15px 10px"}}>5.1.1</td>
      <td style={{paddingBottom: "15px"}}>Does the AI company ensure that the claims made by the AI company comparing its AI models with competitor models clearly state the specific metrics and criteria used for comparison, providing transparent and verifiable information to consumers?</td>
      <td style={{paddingBottom: "15px"}}>Claims comparing AI company's AI models with another competing model should clearly state specific metrics and criteria.</td>

      <td style={{paddingBottom: "15px"}}>Are the performance claims made in the marketing of AI model based on verifiable and substantiated data, and does the company have mechanisms in place to ensure the accuracy and truthfulness of performance-related statements?</td>
      <td style={{paddingBottom: "15px"}}>Performance claims made by AI company should be verifiable and substantiated.</td>

      </td>

      <td style={{padding: "10px 10px 15px 10px"}}>5.1.3</td>
      <td style={{paddingBottom: "15px"}}>Are AI model designed and presented in a manner that ensures consumers can easily understand the features, capabilities of the AI models, without resorting to misleading or ambiguous language?</td>
      <td style={{paddingBottom: "15px"}}>Consumers should be able to understand the features and capabilities easily.</td>

<h3 className="c-secondary">Testable Criteria 5.2.0: Inadequate Disclosure or Omission of Information</h3>
<b>Outcome: Users should have to right information about the risks and limitations of the AI model.</b>

<table>
  <tbody>
    <tr>
      <th style={{padding: "10px"}}>No.</th>
      <th>Question</th>
      <th>Relation to Outcome</th>
      <th>Response</th>
      <th>Elaboration</th>
    </tr>

    <tr>
      <td style={{padding: "10px 10px 15px 10px"}}>5.2.1</td>
      <td style={{paddingBottom: "15px"}}>Where possible (e.g., not compromising IP, safety, or system integrity), does the AI company identify appropriate junctures in the AI lifecycle to inform end users, subjects and other relevant parties about necessary information regarding the AI system (e.g., the purpose, criteria, limitations, impact, and risks of the decision(s) generated by the AI system) in an accessible manner?</td>
      <td style={{paddingBottom: "15px"}}>Ensure that users are informed of the AI model's information (including limitations in accuracy, if any).</td>
      <td style={{padding: "10px 10px 15px 10px"}}>
        <select id="5_2_1" value={props.data["5_2_1"]} onChange={(e)=>props.onChangeData("5_2_1",e.target.value)}>
          <option value="" disabled selected>Select an option</option>
          <option value="NA">Not Applicable</option>
          <option value="Yes">Yes</option>
          <option value="No">No</option>
        </select>
      </td>
      <td>
        <textarea style={{resize: "none"}} className="aiv-textarea" rows={10} cols={24} type="" id="5_2_1_e" value={props.data["5_2_1_e"]} onChange={(e)=>props.onChangeData("5_2_1_e",e.target.value)} />
      </td>
    </tr>

    <tr>
      <td style={{padding: "10px 10px 15px 10px"}}>5.2.2</td>
      <td style={{paddingBottom: "15px"}}>Has the AI company provided the right information to users of the AI model to allow users to make informed choices (including being clear when an AI model is being used)? </td>
      <td style={{paddingBottom: "15px"}}>Ensure that users are able to make informed choices when using the AI model (including the knowledge of when an AI model is being used).</td>
      <td style={{padding: "10px 10px 15px 10px"}}>
        <select id="5_2_2" value={props.data["5_2_2"]} onChange={(e)=>props.onChangeData("5_2_2",e.target.value)}>
